home.title: Stop Violence Against Women
home.subtitle: You are not alone. Together we stand against violence.
home.missionText1: Violence against women is a serious problem encountered in all segments of society and violates women's fundamental human rights. We work to raise awareness in the fight against this problem, support women victims, and accelerate social change.
home.missionText2: Our goal is to ensure that women lead a life without violence and contribute to the achievement of gender equality. Every woman has the right to a safe and dignified life.
home.awarenessDesc: We provide information and raise awareness about all forms of violence against women.
home.supportDesc: We provide psychological, legal and social support to women victims of violence.
home.educationDesc: We organize educational programs on gender equality and violence prevention.
home.legalHelpDesc: We provide counseling services to protect the legal rights of women victims.
home.sonimLine: ALO Violence Hotline - ŞÖNİM (Violence Prevention and Monitoring Center)

crisisPanel.title: Crisis Intervention Panel
crisisPanel.emergencyWarning: This button will automatically call ŞÖNİM in 10 seconds.
crisisPanel.emergencyCountdown: ŞÖNİM (183) will be called in 10 seconds...
crisisPanel.quickLogInfo: Record incidents that happen to you. All records are stored securely.
crisisPanel.privacyText: This panel is completely private. No information is saved and it does not appear in browser history.
crisisPanel.sonimDescription: Support for women victims of violence
crisisPanel.confirmCall: Are you sure you want to call {label}?

safeJournal.title: Personal Records
safeJournal.subtitle: All your records are stored securely
safeJournal.detailsPlaceholder: What happened? (You can write details, don't write names)
safeJournal.perpetratorPlaceholder: E.g: Person A, Spouse, Family member
safeJournal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
safeJournal.noRecordsText: Click the "New Record" button to add your first record.
safeJournal.securityWarningText: These records are only stored on this device. Don't forget to back up important information.
safeJournal.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the record.
safeJournal.saveError: An error occurred while saving the record.
safeJournal.exportError: An error occurred while generating the report.

about.title: About Us
about.whoWeAreText: The "Stop Violence Against Women" platform is a social responsibility project established to raise awareness in the fight against violence against women and support women victims. Our aim is to ensure that women lead a life without violence and contribute to the achievement of gender equality.
about.missionText: To fight against all forms of violence against women, raise social awareness and provide comprehensive support services to women victims. We support women's economic, social and psychological empowerment and defend their legal rights.
about.visionText: To create a society where there is no violence against women, gender equality is fully ensured, and every woman can live safely and with dignity.
about.humanRightsDesc: We respect every woman's fundamental human rights and advocate for the protection of these rights.
about.solidarityDesc: We support solidarity and collective empowerment among women.
about.privacyDesc: We prioritize the privacy and safety of women victims above everything else.
about.equalityDesc: We advocate for gender equality and fight against all forms of discrimination.
about.togetherStrongerText: Fighting violence against women is all of our responsibility. Together we can achieve change by raising awareness, providing support, and raising our voices.

help.title: Emergency Help Lines
help.subtitle: You are not alone. You can call the following numbers to get help.
help.sonimDesc: Violence Prevention and Monitoring Center. 24/7 support line for cases of violence against women.
help.policeDesc: Call to reach law enforcement in emergency situations.
help.healthDesc: Ambulance and health services in emergency health situations.
help.gendarmerieDesc: Gendarmerie assistance in emergency situations in rural areas.
help.legalAidDesc: Legal counseling and legal aid services.
help.psychologicalSupportDesc: Psychological support and counseling with professional psychologists.
help.privacyGuaranteeText: All help lines are completely confidential. Your identity information and the information you share are kept strictly confidential. No information is shared with third parties without your consent.
help.freeServiceText: All help lines are completely free. You do not need to pay any fee when calling from a mobile phone or payphone.
help.sonimCentersText: Violence Prevention and Monitoring Centers (ŞÖNİM) serve in all 81 provinces of Turkey. Psychological support, social service support and legal counseling services are provided free of charge in these centers.
help.sheltersText: There are shelters that provide safe accommodation for women victims of violence and their children. During the stay in these homes, accommodation, nutrition, psychological support and educational services for children are provided. You can call 183 to apply.
help.callEmergencyText: If your life is in danger, call 155; if you need support, call 183.
